items.sentence: Tom was the one who painted that picture of Mary.
I had no idea that Tom couldn't speak any French.
Perhaps I shouldn't have asked Tom that question.
Tom walks his dog every morning before breakfast.
Tom's dog mauled the cat that came into our yard.
I can't help thinking that my son is still alive.
I didn't realize Tom and Mary used to be married.
Tom reassured Mary that she was perfectly normal.
Tom's face feels rough because he needs to shave.
Tom was arrested as a suspect in a criminal case.
